text: The lion and the donkey came together to hunt wild animals. The lion used his strength and the donkey the jaws of his feet. And they gathered a certain number of pieces, and the lion divided them into three parts, and said to the ass, The first is mine, for I am king; and the second is mine, for I am thy partner; and the third, go away, lest it go away like prey. Associate with equals, not more powerful.
title: El león y el asno
author: nan Esopo
